price: Wọ́n sì wí pé: “Èyí kò jẹ́ kiní kan bí kò ṣe idán pọ́nńbélé.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
